title: Wiped
description: Eenralla lives in a Dome.That Dome is run by the Government.The Government has a secret.A secret they want Eenralla to forget.It all started when she touched the wall...Eenie seems to have disappeared completely, and it appears Murkas has won. But Murkas doesn't know about Justin, the boy who was born outside the place Eenie calls home. And the little boy has one thing on his WAKE. UP. EENIE.
author: K. Weikel
